Introduction
This topic contains general information about renouncements, including
regulatory provisions regarding renouncement of the right to a benefit
acceptable means of renouncing the right to a benefit
right of a former beneficiary to file a claim for a benefit previously renounced
, and
effect of the renouncement of one benefit on a beneficiaryâ€™s entitlement to other Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4  - Renouncements
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section None
